comment: Congrats on finding the JSON!  Please don't parse it for anything nefarious.  Thanks!

basics.name: Alex Malott
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Please help im trapped in a resume factory and i cant get out

work.name: Micro Focus
work.summary: Lead a team of three UI engineers developing an Angular UI for managing Helm deployments
highlights: Acted as UI lead for six sprints during primary UI lead's parental leave, then promoted to UI lead
Conducted team trainings on Angular, RxJS and Cypress
Participated extensively in Agile PI and Sprint planning activities

work.name: Micro Focus
work.summary: Developed an Angular UI for managing Helm deployments across the entire ITOM business group
highlights: Trained and mentored three recently graduated UI engineers
Assumed primary responsibility for Cypress (Integration and End to End) tests
Also contributed numerous Java API fixes and features

work.name: Hewlett Packard Enterprise
work.summary: Created and maintained developer tooling for HPE's flagship OneView product
highlights: Maintained several Django web apps for collecting and displaying key group-wide development metrics
Maintained a custom CentOS common development environment image
Independently created a custom Raspberry Pi controlled "traffic light" to display DevTools server statuses

work.name: HP Inc.
work.summary: Assisted an Agile software team developing a multiplatform high performance remote desktop application
highlights: Built custom hardware and software tools that extended existing performance tests across every platform
Introduced bug report tooling for Windows, Linux, and macOS

volunteer.summary: Lead a full redesign of a Ram Reality create-a-thon project for CSU's Department of Occupational Therapy
highlights: Worked extensively with OT department staff to establish and refine requirements
Demonstrated project to students, faculty, and potential donors

courses: CS457 - Computer Networks and the Internet

awards.title: Ram Reality First Place
awards.summary: Developed an innovative VR tool for assessing concussion severity in 48 hours.  Competed against ten other similar teams and projects.
